hints.content:
The bar for green lines up with $\greenD{105}$ on the scale.  


[[☃ image 1]]

$\greenD{105}$ people selected green as their favorite color.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the vertical axis labeled Number of People and the horizontal axis labeled Favorite Color. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Blue, Green, Red, Yellow, and Pink. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 15, 30, 45, 60, 75, 90, 105, and 120. The bar line for each favorite color shows the following: blue bar line extends to 60, green bar line extends to 105, red bar line extends to 45, yellow bar line extends to 90, and pink bar line extends to 90. A green line is drawn to the right from 105, which reaches to the end of the Green bar line. !

hints.content:
The bar for blue lines up with $\blueD{60}$ on the scale.  


[[☃ image 1]]

$\blueD {60}$ people selected blue as their favorite color.

options.alt: A bar graph shows the vertical axis labeled Number of People and the horizontal axis labeled Favorite Color. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Blue, Green, Red, Yellow, and Pink. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 15, 30, 45, 60, 75, 90, 105, and 120. The bar line for each favorite color shows the following: blue bar line extends to 60, green bar line extends to 105, red bar line extends to 45, yellow bar line extends to 90, and pink bar line extends to 90. A blue line is drawn to the right from 60, which reaches to the end of the Blue bar line. !

hints.content: $45$ more people chose green as their favorite color than blue.

question.content:
Chelsea asked people at her school their favorite color and graphed the results of her survey.



[[☃ image 1]]

**How many more people chose green as their favorite color than blue?**

[[☃ input-number 1]] people

options.alt: A bar graph shows the vertical axis labeled Number of People and the horizontal axis labeled Favorite Color. The horizontal axis is labeled, from left to right: Blue, Green, Red, Yellow, and Pink. The vertical axis is labeled from the bottom of the axis to the top of the axis as follows: 0, 15, 30, 45, 60, 75, 90, 105, and 120. The bar line for each favorite color shows the following: blue bar line extends to 60, green bar line extends to 105, red bar line extends to 45, yellow bar line extends to 90, and pink bar line extends to 90. !
